headline: Global Payments to Present at J.P. Morgan U.S. All Stars Conference
summary: ATLANTA, September 09, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN), a leading worldwide provider of payment technology and software solutions, announced today that Cameron Bready, chief executive officer, will present live at the J.P. Morgan U.S. All Stars Conference on Wednesday, September 17 at 11:50 a.m. BST (6:50 AM EST) in London, UK.
